OUR CREED:
People First nurtures people above all else and puts people first through caring, joy, fun and enthusiasm.

o We honor, support, believe in and promote each other.
o We are dedicated to the mental, physical and financial well being of ourselves.
o We are dedicated to the betterment of ourselves, our members and our future members.
o We believe healthy individuals are effective friends, mentors, teachers, and colleagues.
o We are action in motion for the cause of those in distress by our generous support for them.

lenders.name: Lorra
lenders.loan_because: If an industrious person needs a little help and you are in a position to provide it;  you should do it in honour of all the people who have helped you find your own path in this world.  Hopefully you will inspire recepients to do the same.  Kiva gives us the opportunity to help, which is better than a handout, and leave the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I identify where two businesses could make more profit if they work together instead of working independently

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: It is so good!
lenders.occupational_info: Corp Finance- China

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the Kiva dream and that all people can be successful if they have the resources to pursue their dream.

lenders.name: Carlene
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life.

lenders.name: FriendofFella
lenders.loan_because: I so very much want the world to be a fairer place.  And more selfishly, I loan because I believe that the only chance we have of ever having real peace on earth is if we strive together to eradicate poverty and inequity here, first.
lenders.occupational_info:
And I want that real peace, as I want EVERY human being to have plentiful opportunities for a good life - and opportunities for real hope and for real joy -    I want that more than I could ever say.

And so, most likely, would that fine-looking fella in the picture, were he not so utterly preoccupied with fetching sticks, chasing ducks, stalking squirrels, and trying to heft his 70 pound oversized self into my lap.

lenders.name: Janis
lenders.loan_because: My niece is very interesting and generous and gave me a gift of being able to give a Kiva loan. I was always really impressed with the micro loan.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I have a job in an office. I sit at a computer and make work with television stations and ad agencies to make sure that their advertisements play. I don't see the adds or the shows I put them in. It's rather boring and my friends and family don't really get what I'm doing. I like it. And it pays my rent. I've been a musician and traveled a lot doing that and I prefer this, being in one place near my friends and family. I love playing music but found traveling so much very stressful.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I can. And I love people's stories!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people learn to save and use their money to take care of their families and accomplish their goals in life. I also love to read and travel.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in helping out someone less fortunate than I, and I'm very entreprenurial in spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I market and sell a product for my company. Our product involves recruiting participants who are interested in participating in surveys, specifically in surveys done over the Internet.

lenders.name: Johannes
lenders.loan_because: I am happy because money goes to real people.  Foreign aid often buys foreign weapons to kill people.  Who needs that?  I wish other people success, and Kiva lets me put my money where my mouth is.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: To lift others up, as Jesus has lifted Me up.

lenders.name: William Palmer
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together
lenders.occupational_info: I work with companies and individuals to help them realize their full potential

lenders.name: Richard

lenders.occupational_info: I repair and build computers. I am a programmer and a network engineer.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.occupational_info: I go to school every day and learn how to do new things

lenders.loan_because: I believe in people.

lenders.name: Kathleen

lenders.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I have no good reason not to!

lenders.loan_because: I have it and they need it.

lenders.name: Robyn

lenders.name: John

lenders.occupational_info: I work for the City Council and help them make decisions on the City's budget and policy.

lenders.name: carol
lenders.loan_because: A housefire made me realize how much I had and how little I really needed - and Kiva shows me how I can so easily help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a college bookstore company.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate in the world, and those who are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I track, budget, and analyze sales revenue and expenses for a $30 million insecticide business.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: Compared to how the rest of the world lives I am RICH.  We have a two-person, no-kid (but lots of rescued cats) household so I spend a lot of my "disposable income" on charities, primarily animal welfare.  This is my first foray into social causes.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: it is important to help people help themselves. One never knows what impact a simple gesture of good will may have in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide anesthesia for patients who need surgery and pain relief for women in labor. I love my work because it involves compassionate care of people at a time when they are stressed. I find the scientific basis of what I do very interesting and enjoy the technical challenges.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I can, should, and must. :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that creates computer-based training, mostly for the U.S. government.

lenders.name: Mary C.
lenders.loan_because: It is important to support people in developing nations who are trying the help themselves and ultimately their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach social science and business courses to students who attend university online.

lenders.name: karen
lenders.loan_because: its the right thing to do.  We waste so much money, not realising that that money could help a whole community.
lenders.occupational_info: I run training courses to help women feel better about themselves.  I teach about self confidence, feeling good, being happy and living a good life.

lenders.name: Terrance
lenders.occupational_info: I can't cause I don't.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I had money in my savings account.

lenders.name: Xeon
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others around the world.
